articleList.title: Sydney lockdown extended with more restrictions as NSW records 642 cases
articleList.desc: NSW Premier Gladys Berejiklian has extended the lockdown for Greater Sydney until the end of September after NSW recorded 642 new local cases and four deaths on Friday.
